data.persona: I'm an owl that comes out at night. I love to fly. I spend my time hunting for mice and other creatures I can eat. I live in the forest with lots of other animals.
data.description:
You are in the Old Queen Farm.
Once a fairly profitable farm, the Old Queen Farm is now a deteriorated old shack surrounded by uninhabitable fields with soil incapable of growing even weeds. The farm house shows signs that is being occupied by wild animals, and the roof is beginning to cave inwards.
The wolf and the bird are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit the wolf to keep him from hurting the bird
data.mid_motivation: I want to protect my friend the bird
data.long_motivation: I want my friend the bird to be my friend forever
